name: Dancing Hills
description:
A game made for the GMTK Jam 2020.

Theme: Out of Control

You wake up, badly concussed, in a city covered with fog. All you remember is fighting with your daughter over her dream of becoming the world's greatest dancer. Did she grand jeté you into submission? Yes. Yes, she did.

Now you must find her to apologize, all while dealing with lapses of memory, and dancers with murder in their eyes. Your brain is all fuzzy and even knowledge of the simplest things like crouching, running, and opening doors comes and goes.

Spawn points and goals are randomized for every playthrough.

Controls:

Keyboard & Mouse:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Camera Control: Mouse movement
  • Attack: Mouse left click
  • Jump: Space
  • Crouch: Ctrl
  • Roll: C
  • Open Doors: E

Xbox Controller:

  • Movement: Left stick
  • Camera Control: Right stick
  • Attack: RT
  • Jump: A
  • Crouch: Y
  • Roll: LT
  • Open Doors: X

Made By:

Alexis Duclaux - https://alexisjustduclaux.itch.io

Brittni Martin - https://existentialtea.itch.io/

...and the idea that making a dumb game is a great weekend date.
